abstract: General Electric, as part of its regular review of its portfolios, agreed to sell $100 million of Genpact shares in a private deal, the companies said late on Friday.
lead_paragraph: General Electric, as part of its regular review of its portfolios, agreed to sell $100 million of Genpact shares in a private deal, the companies said late on Friday.

headline.main: G.E. Sells $100 Million Stake in Genpact
